name: The Young Gabriel King Chronicles
summary: The Young Gabriel King Chronicles is a free 2D click-and-point adventure game. It features an inventory. The game can be controlled via mouse and keyboard. As young Gabriel King you get thrown out the camping wagon by your mother in order to search for a replacement of a book she is reading and also get a lighter. It is a very short game and takes place on one screen. Unlicensed spin-off / fan game of the Gabriel Knight series.
